name: Chaos
description: This algorithm generates chaotic CVs according to a variety of so-called ‘attractors’, including the well-known Lorenz equations [58]. Each generates three CVs, named X, Y, and Z, which are available on separate outputs. You can modify the parameters of the Lorenz equation – ‘Rho mod’ affects 'r' (aka 'ρ'), and ‘Beta mod’ affects 'b' (aka 'β'). With the values at 0V, the parameters are the classic values as studied by Lorenz (28 and 8/3 respectively).

parameters.name: Attractor
parameters.description: Chooses which equations to use: Lorenz, Rössler, Aizawa, Arneodo, or Thomas.

parameters.name: Speed range
parameters.description: Sets the range of the Speed control, in quarter octaves (i.e. a change of 4 doubles or halves the speed).

parameters.name: Speed
parameters.description: Controls the speed of the simulation.

parameters.name: Reset
parameters.description: When this parameter is set to 1, the system is reset to the values given by the Reset X/Y/Z parameters.

parameters.name: Reset X
parameters.description: The X value to reset to.

parameters.name: Reset Y
parameters.description: The Y value to reset to.

parameters.name: Reset Z
parameters.description: The Z value to reset to.

parameters.name: X output mode
parameters.description: The standard Add/Replace mode selector as described above.

parameters.name: Y output mode
parameters.description: The standard Add/Replace mode selector as described above.

parameters.name: Z output mode
parameters.description: The standard Add/Replace mode selector as described above.

input_ports.name: Reset input
input_ports.description: The bus to use for the reset input. A positive-going edge here resets the system to the values given by the Reset X/Y/Z parameters.

output_ports.name: X
output_ports.description: Chaotic CV output corresponding to the Lorenz attractor's X value (or equivalent for other attractors).

output_ports.name: Y
output_ports.description: Chaotic CV output corresponding to the Lorenz attractor's Y value (or equivalent for other attractors).

output_ports.name: Z
output_ports.description: Chaotic CV output corresponding to the Lorenz attractor's Z value (or equivalent for other attractors).

output_ports.name: X output
output_ports.description: The bus to use for the X output.

output_ports.name: Y output
output_ports.description: The bus to use for the Y output.

output_ports.name: Z output
output_ports.description: The bus to use for the Z output.
